languages.text: "///Мы поняли. Останавливать функции живых можно только когда ты скажешь. Ты же скажешь нам, да? Нам нравится делать что-то вместе с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "///Мы поняли. Останавливать функции живых можно только когда ты скажешь. Ты же скажешь нам, да? Нам нравится делать что-то вместе с тобой".

languages.text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."
languages.original_text: "///Мы поняли. Останавливать функции живых можно только когда ты скажешь. Ты же скажешь нам, да? Нам нравится делать что-то вместе с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."
"///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."
"///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."
"///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."
"///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

languages.text: 「///分かりました。あなたに生物の機能を止めるように言われた時だけ止めます。言ってくれますね？我々はあなたと一緒に何かするのが好きです」
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: 「///分かりました。あなたに生物の機能を止めるように言われた時だけ止めます。言ってくれますね？我々はあなたと一緒に何かするのが好きです」

languages.text: “///我们现在明白了。必须得到你的命令，我们才能停止生物的生命机能。你会告诉我们的，是吗？我们喜欢和你一起做事。”
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: “///我们现在明白了。必须得到你的命令，我们才能停止生物的生命机能。你会告诉我们的，是吗？我们喜欢和你一起做事。”

languages.text: "///Wir verstehen jetzt. Wir können Funktionen von lebenden Dingen nur stoppen, wenn Ihr es uns auftragt. Ihr tragt es uns doch auf, nicht wahr? Wir unternehmen gerne etwas mit Euch."
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: "///Wir verstehen jetzt. Wir können Funktionen von lebenden Dingen nur stoppen, wenn Ihr es uns auftragt. Ihr tragt es uns doch auf, nicht wahr? Wir unternehmen gerne etwas mit Euch."

languages.text: « ///Nous comprenons. Nous n'arrêterons le fonctionnement des êtres vivants que lorsque vous nous le demanderez. Vous nous le demanderez, n'est-ce pas ? Nous aimons faire des choses pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: « ///Nous comprenons. Nous n'arrêterons le fonctionnement des êtres vivants que lorsque vous nous le demanderez. Vous nous le demanderez, n'est-ce pas ? Nous aimons faire des choses pour vous. »

languages.text: «///Ahora lo entendemos. Solo podemos detener las funciones de los seres vivos cuando usted nos lo diga. Nos lo dirá, ¿verdad? Disfrutamos haciendo cosas con usted».
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: «///Ahora lo entendemos. Solo podemos detener las funciones de los seres vivos cuando usted nos lo diga. Nos lo dirá, ¿verdad? Disfrutamos haciendo cosas con usted».

languages.text: "///Şimdi anlıyoruz. Canlıların yaşam fonksiyonlarını, yalnızca siz emrettiğinizde durduracağız. Emir vereceksiniz, değil mi? Sizinle beraber bir şeyler yapmak hoşumuza gidiyor."
languages.original_text: "///We understand now. We may only stop functions of living things when you tell us to. You will tell us, will you not? We enjoy doing things with you."

traits.locale_text: "///Şimdi anlıyoruz. Canlıların yaşam fonksiyonlarını, yalnızca siz emrettiğinizde durduracağız. Emir vereceksiniz, değil mi? Sizinle beraber bir şeyler yapmak hoşumuza gidiyor."
